com.jacobschneider.engine.math.vectorcalc

Class SumVectorField

  • Object
    • AbstractVectorField
      • SumVectorField
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VectorField

    public final class SumVectorField
extends AbstractVectorField
    A vector field that represents the sum of two other vector fields.
    Author:
    Jacob

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SumVectorField(VectorField a, VectorField b)
      Creates a new vector field that represents the vector addition of each vector at every point in 3D space.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Evaluates the curl of this vector field at a certain position in 3D space

      Evaluates the divergence of this vector field at a certain position in 3D space
      Vector3 getValue(Vector3 point)
      The value of this vector field at a certain position in 3D space.
